entry.title: neuherbs Instant Green Coffee Premix
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Green Coffee
Price: 199.00 - 399.00 (2 variants)

neuherbs is the first brand to introduce this refreshing drink in India. neuherbs green coffee premix is plant-based and uses raw and unroasted green coffee beans with associated health benefits.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Instant Green Coffee For Weight Management

    Green coffee possesses chlorogenic acid (an antioxidant), which helps boost metabolism & hence aids in weight management.

  • Instant Green Coffee For Blood Sugar Management

    It delivers the benefits of improved insulin sensitivity, which helps maintain blood sugar levels after a high-carb meal.

  • Instant Green Coffee For Detoxification

    The richness of antioxidants helps flush out toxins & makes it perfect for body detoxification.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw Green Coffee

    To deliver you the natural gift of mother earth.

  • Sachet Form

    To help you lose weight on busy schedules

  • Preservatives Free

    To deliver safe & quality product

— How To Use —

  • Take 1 cup of green coffee

  • Before your heavy meals

  • Pre/post workout or replace with regular coffee

  • How many times can I take?

    You can take it 2-3 times a day.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Instant Green Coffee Premix is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Does it contain caffeine?

    Yes, it does contain natural caffeine, which is less in comparison to normal roasted coffee.

  • How many grams of green coffee are present in one sachet?

    One sachet of Instant Green Coffee Premix contains 3g of green coffee.

  • How to prepare it?

    Just tear the sachet, pour in 1 glass of lukewarm or normal water, and give it a strirr. Then drink it.

  • Can I use it for a face pack?

    No, as per recommendation it should not be used for topical application, for better results you can consume it orally.

  • Can I add lemon to it?

    neuherbs Instant Green Coffee Premix contains lemon flavour but for a customised taste according to your preference you can add lemon or honey in it.

entry.title: Green Coffee Beans Powder for Weight Management
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Green Coffee
Price: 199.00 - 979.00 (3 variants)

Green Coffee Beans Powder are grounded form of unroasted coffee beans that are packed with antioxidants and pharmacologically active compounds. It is believed that green coffee supports Weight management efficiently.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Green Coffee Powder For Weight Loss

    Green coffee is known to possess chlorogenic acid (an antioxidant) which helps boost metabolism & hence assists in weight management.

  • Green Coffee Powder For Blood Sugar Management

    Help improve insulin function, which assists in maintaining blood sugar levels post high carb meal

  • Green Coffee Powder For Detoxification

    The richness of antioxidants help flush out toxins & makes it perfect for body detoxification.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw Beans Powder

    To deliver easy to use green coffee

  • No Added Additives

    To deliver only natural ingredients

  • Heavy Metals Tested

    To deliver safe & quality product

— How To Use —

  • Take 1 cup of green coffee

  • Before your heavy meals

  • Pre/post workout

  • Is it effective for weight loss ?

    Yes, Green Coffee is known to boost metabolism and reduces fat absorption in the body which can help you in losing or managing weight.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Raw, Unroasted Green Coffee Beans are best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Is it licensed through fssai?

    Yes, neuherbs unroasted green coffee beans is made as per fssai guidelines.

  • Can we add sugar or honey into it?

    neuherbs Green Coffee Beans have a unique & natural taste, but if you want to enhance its taste you can add honey & lemon according to your preference and weight goals.

  • Can it be consumed by a 14 year old child?

    No, as per recommendation it can be consumed by people above 18 years of age.

  • I am a nursing mother can I take it?

    No, as per recommendation pregnant and lactating mothers can not consume it.

  • Can I use it in normal or cold water?

    Yes, it can be used in normal or cold water as per your taste preference.

  • Green Coffee Beans For Blood Sugar Management

    Help improve insulin function, which assists in maintaining blood sugar levels

  • Green Coffee Beans For Detoxification

    To deliver the naturally intact nutrients

— How To Use —

  • Take 1 cup of green coffee

  • Before your heavy meals

  • Take 1 cup of green coffee

  • Is it effective for weight loss?

    Yes, Green Coffee is known to boost metabolism and reduces fat absorption in the body which can help you in losing or managing weight.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Raw, Unroasted Green Coffee Beans are best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Is it licensed through fssai?

    Yes, neuherbs unroasted green coffee beans is made as per fssai guidelines.

  • Can we add sugar or honey into it?

    neuherbs Green Coffee Beans have a unique & natural taste, but if you want to enhance its taste you can add honey & lemon according to your preference and weight goals.

  • Do I need to use it whole or can I convert it into powder?

    Yes, you can grind it in strong grinder and use it by converting in powder.

  • Can I use after roasting?

    Green Coffee beans are unroasted due to which they consists of nutrients that are not available in roasted coffee, so to take advantage of green coffee use it unroasted.

  • Do I need to throw beans after soaking?

    No, you can boil the water along with beans, so obtain its maximum benefits.
